long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Gmail Cleaner, Extension that helps you clean your gmail inbox

In a world full of digital chaos and clutter, one email platform stands tall, defying the overwhelming tide of disorganization. 

Welcome, dear viewer, to a dramatic journey of liberation in your virtual sanctuary. 

Are you tired of staring at a cluttered Gmail inbox, drowning in a sea of unopened messages? 

Declutter your Gmail and attain a newfound sense of organization. It's time to take control of your inbox.
